/opt/odroid-x2/compiler/bin/arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++  -fPIC -std=c++11  --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk   -shared -Wl,-soname,liblight.so -o /home/mi/boroujeni/model_car/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/.private/light/lib/liblight.so CMakeFiles/light.dir/src/lights.cpp.o  -L/opt/odroid-x2/sdk/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/mesa-egl  -L/opt/odroid-x2/sdk/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/mesa
